original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, as Manasseh his father had done. Amon sacrificed to all the images that Manasseh his father had made, and served them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 므낫세의 행함 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세가 만든 아로새긴 모든 우상에게 제사하여 섬겼으며

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 악한 일을 행했다

sentences.original_text: as Manasseh his father had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 므낫세가 행한 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: Amon sacrificed to all the images
that Manasseh his father had made
